Half Life 2 isn't necessarily a bad game, but I certainly would not recommend it. The story isn't necessarily bad but there also isn't much too it either; its pretty straightforward. Honestly I wasn't as immersed in it as I hoped to be. The world in which the story takes place is pretty interesting, but unfortunately the story that the player takes on truly pales in comparison. There were also a lot of sequences in the game where I was just waiting for it to be over; and unfortunately while the game does have some nice sequences, when I think of my playthrough of Half Life 2, the frustration of going through the boring sequences is the first thing that comes to mind. Even though you have quite the arsenal of guns at your disposal that are each fun to use(gravity gun especially), the diversity of guns doesn't really matter since the gunfights are not engaging; primarily because of the boring (and not so smart) enemies. Because of this, the game mostly feels like you're just wandering about without much motivation; just rushing to finish it, hoping that you will be rewarded with some immersion or nice level design(which I feel is quite rare in this game). The game has no stand-out moments; I can't remember a moment that I was completely in awe of, except for the ending maybe. But thats the thing really; if you want to know the story of Half Life 2(which again, isn't all too compelling), I would rather watch a playthrough or story recap on YouTube. For me there is no replay value here; I played the game once, and have absolutely no motivation to play through it again unlike so many other single player games.

There are a lot of diverse things you do in Half Life 2 to be sure, but without much fun or immersion to go along with it.

This game is honestly amazing, probably one of the best games I've ever played. Even though I don't really like shooters, I loved this game. An amazing story, lots of characters, a pretty deep lore, a masterpiece. Average playtime is around 15 to 17 hours, hours spent fighting deadly zombies or highly trained soldiers, solving puzzles to make your way through the places each chapter takes place in (Such as a city, some canals, a ghost town, a highway, etc.), learning more and more about the story, and more!

Plus, don't worry if you want to get this one first instead of Half-Life 1, there's not many things that you must play HL1 to understand, only a few, such as the identity and backstory of two certain characters, what a specific event mentioned many times throughout the game is, etc.

10/10. I highly recommend it.

This is one of the most legendary games that ever existed. Back in 2004 this rocked the world, it was a massive hit.

Does it still hold up today? I'd say yeah. 
The game runs very well, Obviously. the game came out in 2004. It can run on basically almost everything.
The gameplay is pretty good. Weapons feel good to use.
The graphics are a tad bit dated, It looks very source-ish. However there are multiple mods that ups the graphic.
The story is pretty nice, There are some parts that gets kinda boring. Especially at the last part.

Overall, yea. You should definitely get this game, Preferably on sale. It's 1 dollar on sale.

Я не любитель коридорных шутеров ибо в своё время наигрался в них очень много. Играл во многие, кроме Half Life 2, то ли не интересно было или никто из друзей не играл. Ожидал 4 часа унылых перестрелок, разбавленных водным сюжетом и что спустя два часа меня бы уже воротило, "я никогда так не ошибался!". Несмотря на возраст игры "2004", Half Life 2 оказалась интереснее многих современных шутеров. В игре есть всё что вы видели в коридорных шутерах, но всё это сделано в меру, [b]чередует сюжет, динамичные сцены, передвижение на транспорте, новые механики игры и виды оружия[/b] именно в нужный момент не успев стать пресным но и не давя на один лишь экшн, подобного я не видел ещё ни в одном шутере. Логические задачи на протяжении игры не требуют образования из Хогвартса, но и не лежат на поверхности и требуют немного внимательности и немного логики. Что бы вы не думали что я нахваливаю игру, я приведу ниже все её минусы а именно: 1) Тупые напарники (ах да в игре еще и сплывает интересная механика с напарниками) которые часто препятствуют перемещению. 2) Мыльные окна, нюанс к графике, сомнительный и незначительный. 3) Русская локализация периодически хромает
Вот собственно и все её минусы. Сюжет: хорошо. Физика: отлично. Графика: 2004 что ты ждешь. Геймплей: 8.5/10.
